Entry.JapaneseText: どう、みんな！ 空を飛ぶ気分は？
Entry.EnglishText: How is it, guys? What's it like flying through the sky?

Entry.JapaneseText: うん！ 楽しいヨ！ シャオルーンもずいぶん楽しそうだネ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's really fun! You look like you're having a good time too, Shaorune.

Entry.JapaneseText: そりゃ、久しぶりの空だもん！
Entry.EnglishText: Well, it's been a long time since I've been in the sky!

Entry.JapaneseText: ずっと聖殿で眠ってたからネ♪
Entry.EnglishText: Because you've been sleeping in the Temple♪

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、忘れないで。 キミたちには大切な使命があるって事を。
Entry.EnglishText: But, don't forget, you have an important mission ahead of you.
